ygData.subject: Re: Having problems with 39 charm song
ygData.msgSnippet: The only times I have trouble getting my pet to attack (with the 39 song) is if the command comes too close to a previous /pet command or I m too far away from
ygData.messageBody:
The only times I have trouble getting my pet to attack (with the 39
song) is if the command comes too close to a previous /pet command or
I'm too far away from him to hear the message.

From your example, if all those commands are in ONE hotkey, then I'd
say that is the problem. I haven't had success making a hotkey of:

/pet back off
/pet attack

It will only do the /pet back off portion. If those commands are
typed in or done at an interval, then I'm not sure what the problem
is, other than a surly pet. My surly pets end up dead.... Hmmm... It
so happens that my good pets end up dead as well...

:p

Darkfox Reven'tsol



> I can't figure out why I can't get this song to work. I charm the
mob (eyes
> glaze over message), give it /pet back off (get message from pet),
target a
> mob, hit auto attack, then give /pet attack command (do not get a
message
> from pet). When I follow these steps, the mob just sits there and
does
> nothing. It helps by keeping the mob from attacking us, but I would
> obviously prefer if he attacked what I told him to. Need someone
who has
> experience charming with the 39 charm song to tell me what you do
to get
> your pet to attack. BTW I do not have this problem with the 27
charm song.
>
>
> Galtin of E'ci
